LanguageData.RT_CH53E_Vehicle.label: CH53E Super Stallion
LanguageData.RT_CH53E_Vehicle.description:
A heavy-lift helicopter with a good top speed and amazing performance for both cargo and passenger transport, but at the cost of huge size and high fuel consumption.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2, Passenger x10
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
